data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Hellas Verona get the game underway.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Genoa at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Antonio Rapuano signals a Genoa throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
In the minute 4, Genoa have a goal kick.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 8, Antonio Rapuano signals a throw-in for Hellas Verona, close to Genoa's area.
Antonio Rapuano awards the away team a throw-in.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Rapuano.
Ronaldo Vieira for Hellas Verona gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
In the minute 11, Free kick Hellas Verona.
At Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi, Milan Badelj has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 12, Hellas Verona attack but Federico Ceccherini's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Ivan Ilic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hellas Verona.
In the minute 14, Antonio Rapuano awards Genoa a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Genoa.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 16, Andrea Favilli of Hellas Verona is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Hellas Verona.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 18, Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 21, Hellas Verona's Ebrima Colley gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Hellas Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Ebrima Colley (Hellas Verona) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Genoa defenders.
In Verona Genoa drive forward through Ivan Radovanovic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Hellas Verona will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Genoa.
In the minute 25, Genoa's Nicolo Rovella breaks free at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 27, Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
Genoa are pushing forward but Nicolo Rovella's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
In the minute 29, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Adrien Tameze.
Hellas Verona's Adrien Tameze looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Goran Pandev for Genoa drives towards goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Genoa have been awarded a corner by Antonio Rapuano.
In Verona Hellas Verona drive forward through Ebrima Colley. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Rapuano.
In the minute 35, Hellas Verona's Ronaldo Vieira gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Genoa defender.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Can Genoa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hellas Verona's half?
Throw-in for Genoa close to the penalty box.
Hellas Verona to take a throw-in in Genoa territory.
In the minute 38, Antonio Rapuano awards Genoa a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Hellas Verona in Verona.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona's Andrea Favilli goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Rapuano.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Genoa.
In the minute 43, Goran Pandev (Genoa) has received a yellow card from Antonio Rapuano.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 45, Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 45, Adrien Tameze of Hellas Verona gets in a strike, but is off target.
Genoa have a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Genoa kick-off.
Ball safe as Hellas Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 47, Hellas Verona pushes forward through Andrea Favilli, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
Hellas Verona drives forward and Ebrima Colley gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 49, Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Genoa needs to be cautious. Hellas Verona have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Genoa in their own half.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Genoa.
Genoa are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 53, Adrien Tameze is booked for the home team.
Genoa push forward at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi and Ivan Radovanovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hellas Verona defence.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
In the minute 54, Paolo Ghiglione (Genoa) has received a first yellow card.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Rapuano.
In the minute 55, Hellas Verona surge into the attack at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi but Andrea Favilli’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
Ebrima Colley gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hellas Verona.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Rapuano.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 59, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Rapuano.
Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Antonio Rapuano awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Nikola Kalinic is replacing Andrea Favilli for the home team.
Throw-in Genoa.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Genoa in their own half.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Hellas Verona's Darko Lazovic gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Genoa in the half of Hellas Verona.
In the minute 63, Gianluca Scamacca is replacing Eldor Shomurodov for Genoa at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Antonio Rapuano signals a Hellas Verona throw-in in Genoa's half.
Genoa's Gianluca Scamacca misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 66, Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
The home team replace Alan Empereur with Federico Dimarco.
Hellas Verona have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 68, Mattia Bani is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Edoardo Goldaniga (Genoa) has replaced the possibly injured Mattia Bani.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
In the minute 72, Davide Faraoni's header is off-target for Hellas Verona.
Antonio Rapuano awards Genoa a goal kick.
Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Genoa to take a throw-in in Hellas Verona territory.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Antonio Rapuano signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 77, Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Antonio Rapuano.
Goal kick for Genoa at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi.
Ball safe as Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Rolando Maran (Genoa) is making a third substitution, with Valon Behrami replacing Milan Badelj.
The away team have replaced Nicolo Rovella with Steeve Mike Eboua Ebongue. This is the fourth substitution made today by Rolando Maran.
Rolando Maran is making the team's fifth substitution at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi with Vittorio Parigini replacing Goran Pandev.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Genoa.
Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Eddie Salcedo is on a sub for Adrien Tameze for Hellas Verona.
In the minute 81, Hellas Verona make their fourth substitution with Mattia Zaccagni replacing Ebrima Colley.
Free kick for Genoa in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 84, Can Hellas Verona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Hellas Verona push upfield and Davide Faraoni gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Genoa defence.
Free kick Hellas Verona.
In the minute 85, Edoardo Goldaniga (Genoa) gets a yellow card.
Can Hellas Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Genoa's half?
Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Mattia Zaccagni for Hellas Verona drives towards goal at Stadio Marcantonio Bentegodi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Hellas Verona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Genoa's Vittorio Parigini has run offside.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Nikola Kalinic (Hellas Verona) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Genoa goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
